Wagon Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2021-01-09  | Version: 2.0.1-SNAPSHOT
Wagon
Overview
  • Introduction
  • Usage
  • Goals
  • FAQ
Examples
  • Comprehensive

wagon:update-maven-3

Full name:

org.codehaus.mojo:wagon-maven-plugin:2.0.1-SNAPSHOT:update-maven-3

Description:

Work around for WAGON-407 to copy commons-io, commons-lang, and jsoup to ${maven.home}/lib/ext directory.

Attributes:

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
<commonsIoVersion> String - commons-io:commons-io version
Default value is: 2.2.
User property is: commonsIoVersion.
<commonsLangVersion> String - commons-lang:commons-lang version
Default value is: 2.6.
User property is: commonsLangVersion.
<jsoupVersion> String - org.jsoup:jsoup version
Default value is: 1.7.2.
User property is: jsoupVersion.
<localRepository> ArtifactRepository - (no description)
Default value is: ${localRepository}.
<remoteRepositories> List - (no description)
Default value is: ${project.remoteArtifactRepositories}.

Parameter Details

<commonsIoVersion>

commons-io:commons-io version
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: commonsIoVersion
  • Default: 2.2

<commonsLangVersion>

commons-lang:commons-lang version
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: commonsLangVersion
  • Default: 2.6

<jsoupVersion>

org.jsoup:jsoup version
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: jsoupVersion
  • Default: 1.7.2

<localRepository>

(no description)
  • Type: org.apache.maven.artifact.repository.ArtifactRepository
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${localRepository}

<remoteRepositories>

(no description)
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.remoteArtifactRepositories}
